resources.string: Welcome to Brain Sprain! Our goal is to help alleviate your stress and anxiety by providing a few coping mechanisms that will help calm you down. How do tell if you are not calm? We measure your heart rate using a device that has a pulse sensor. When your heart rate reaches a thresh hold of 120 - 150 beats per minute (bpm) the app will notify you and you will be able to begin with a coping mechanism that was rated by you

Before continuing with the setup of the app make sure your bluetooth is turned on. Also make sure you are connected to the HC-O5 heart rate monitoring device. If you are not, go to your device settings, find your bluetooth settings, turn on bluetooth and pair with HC-O5. Your beats per minute will also be displayed on the main screen and it will also show if you are properly connected to the HC-O5 device. Press the "next button" below to continue.
On a scale of 1 to 5 how do you enjoy yoga?
